title.en: Combine and match biodiversity data from separate sources (2/5)

description.en: This process combines and matches biodiveryity data, i.e. occurrences for various species, from the sources GBIF, iNaturalist and VertNet, with data provided by the user or other sources. For more details, please ask BOKU.

input_datasets.title: Occurrence data (GBIF, iNaturalist, VertNet, or from any other source)
input_datasets.description: URL to CSV tables containing the occurrences from GBIF, iNaturalist and VertNet. This can be the outcome of the getdata process.

colnames_species_names.title: Column names: Species names
colnames_species_names.description: List of column names that indicate the Species Name in each of the provided datasets. Example: "speciesname, scientificName"

colnames_countries.title: Column names: Country
colnames_countries.description: List of column names that indicate the Country in each of the provided datasets. Example: "JDS4_sampling_ID"

colnames_lat.title: Column names: Latitude
colnames_lat.description: List of column names that indicate the Latitude in each of the provided datasets. Example: "lat, latitude"

colnames_lon.title: Column names: Longitude
colnames_lon.description: List of column names that indicate the Longitude in each of the provided datasets. Example: "lon, long, longitude"

colnames_date.title: Column names: Dates
colnames_date.description: List of column names that indicate the dates in each of the provided datasets. Example: "Date, sampling_date"

matched_biodiversity_data.title: Combined occurrences
matched_biodiversity_data.description: A table containing the combined occurrences (user data and online data).
